description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for creating and managing a crossword puzzle interface, including functions for rendering the puzzle grid, handling user input, navigation, and answer checking.

classes.name: puzInit
classes.description: Initialization object for setting up the crossword puzzle, including grid creation, coordinate calculation, and answer checking.

classes.name: nav
classes.description: Navigation helper object for moving between clues and entries within the crossword puzzle.

classes.name: util
classes.description: Utility functions for highlighting entries and clues, managing classes, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sorts data, sets event handlers, and builds the puzzle grid and clues.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for each puzzle entry based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with input fields for each puzzle entry and adds clue labels.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input matches the answer for the active entry.
